Reviews.Title: very happy with it
Reviews.Author: aunre
Reviews.Content: great dvr. the iphone app gives so many options to use with the dvr. playback record, audio and many more

ProductInfo.Features:
Remotely monitor from anywhere in the word via the internet or your Supported 3G/4G Smartphones
Includes Pre-installed 1TB Hard Drive
MAC and PC Compatible
Customize up to 24 cameras
Receive email alerts upon motion detection
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QT2124-1 24-Channel H.264 Smart Recording DVR with Pre-Installed 1TB Hard Drive (Black)
